== Koodali (CT) (627272) ==

Koodali (CT) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 16.85 sq. km. and harbouring 3447 households with total population of 15236 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 525 km. Male population is 7074 and female population is 8162. Scheduled Caste population is 288 and Scheduled Tribes population is 31. Census Location Code of the town is 627272<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 79 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 105 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 22 km.
